articles.author: Katie Canales
articles.title: Amazon Prime Video is getting a facelift that looks a lot like Netflix - Business Insider India
articles.description:
1. Amazon Prime Video is getting a facelift that looks a lot like Netflix  Business Insider India
  2. Prime Video gets a full redesign at last, rolling out this week  Pocket-lint
  3. Amazon is giving Prime Video its biggest redesign in years …
articles.content:
The streaming
 wars are raging on, and Amazon
 just updated part of its battle strategy.
The tech giant is rolling out a flashy new redesign for its Prime Video homepage, complete with an easy-to-… [+1474 chars]
